subject: Golf
Women's British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Lydia Ko, a 15-year-old South Korean-born New Zealander, plays golf with an ability that seems far beyond her years and has managed to challenge the sport’s best.
snippet: Lydia Ko, a 15-year-old South Korean-born New Zealander, plays golf with an ability that seems far beyond her years and has managed to challenge the sport’s best.
